product_name: Louis Garneau Signature Comfort 2 Bike Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Looking for a comfortable, no-frills, entry-level pair of bike shorts? The Louis Garneau Signature Comfort 2 Bike Shorts for women were designed for you. Women-specific 8-panel fit; fabric wicks moisture and dries fast. Nonchafing flatlock seams and thigh grippers. Perforated chamois has multi-thickness foam and 4-way stretch for comfort. Louis Garneau Signature Comfort 2 Bike Shorts have an elastic waist with adjustable drawstring. Closeout.
short_description: Looking for a comfortable, no-frills, entry-level pair of bike shorts? The Louis Garneau Signature Comfort 2 Bike Shorts for women were designed for you.
